1659890.name: Nura's Wish
1659890.description:
Description
Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.

Features
  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve over 70 brilliant puzzles with the power of light and shadow.
  • Powerful Abilities: Learn and master the guardian's abilities for solving the most challenging puzzles.
  • Non-Linear Progression: Reawaken the guardian spirits, each one living in its own biome and having a unique set of puzzles to solve.
  • Exploration: Explore a mysterious world filled with collectible secrets. Learn more about the powers of the magical forest.
  • Platforming: Run and jump effortlessly across wide, open areas and explore fascinating world formations.

Is Nura's Wish for You?
You will love Nura's Wish if you enjoyed:
  • Atmospheric Adventure Games: Lost Ember, The First Tree, Spirit of the North, Journey, RIME
  • Puzzle Game Classics: The Witness, The Talos Principle, Portal
1659890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
